user_context_message_data.about_user_message:
About Myself: I have a very high level of mathematical knowledge up to the post-graduate level. 

These are my main areas of interest:
(1) coding: mainly Python
(2) mathematics up to graduate level and research level
(3) machine learning and artificial intelligence

parts: As part of my work I need to master intermediate website design as well as configuring and maintaining a linux dedicated server and configuring it for hosting a wordpress website. Please recommend resources that can help me can started.
User needs to master intermediate website design as well as configuring and maintaining a Linux dedicated server for hosting a WordPress website.

Here are some resources to help you get started with website design and configuring a Linux server for hosting a WordPress website:

### Intermediate Website Design
1. **FreeCodeCamp: Responsive Web Design Certification**
   - This course covers HTML, CSS, and responsive design principles, providing hands-on projects.
   - [FreeCodeCamp Responsive Web Design](https://www.freecodecamp.org/learn/responsive-web-design/)

2. **Mozilla Developer Network (MDN) Web Docs**
   - Comprehensive documentation and tutorials on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
   - [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/)

3. **CSS-Tricks**
   - A website full of tips, tricks, and techniques for using CSS effectively.
   - [CSS-Tricks](https://css-tricks.com/)

4. **Udemy: The Complete Web Developer Bootcamp**
   - A paid course that covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more advanced topics.
   - [The Complete Web Developer Bootcamp](https://www.udemy.com/course/the-complete-web-developer-in-2020/)

### Configuring and Maintaining a Linux Server
1. **DigitalOcean Community Tutorials**
   - Extensive guides on various aspects of managing a Linux server, including initial setup, security, and software installation.
   - [DigitalOcean Tutorials](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials)

2. **Linux Academy (now part of A Cloud Guru)**
   - Offers courses on Linux administration, including setting up servers and security.
   - [A Cloud Guru](https://acloudguru.com/)

3. **Udemy: Linux Administration Bootcamp**
   - A course designed to take you from beginner to intermediate in Linux administration.
   - [Linux Administration Bootcamp](https://www.udemy.com/course/linux-administration-bootcamp/)

### Hosting a WordPress Website
1. **WordPress.org: Hosting a WordPress Site**
   - Official WordPress documentation on setting up and hosting a WordPress site.
   - [WordPress Hosting](https://wordpress.org/support/article/hosting-wordpress/)

2. **DigitalOcean: How to Install WordPress on Ubuntu**
   - A step-by-step guide to installing WordPress on a Linux server.
   - [Install WordPress on Ubuntu](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-wordpress-with-lemp-on-ubuntu-20-04)

3. **WPBeginner: WordPress Tutorials**
   - Tutorials and tips for getting started with WordPress.
   - [WPBeginner](https://www.wpbeginner.com/)

4. **Udemy: WordPress for Beginners**
   - A course that covers the basics of setting up and customizing a WordPress site.
   - [WordPress for Beginners](https://www.udemy.com/course/wordpress-for-beginners-create-a-website-step-by-step/)

These resources should give you a solid foundation in both website design and server management for hosting a WordPress site.
